io.micronaut.function.aws.runtime

Class MicronautLambdaRuntime

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.function.aws.runtime.MicronautLambdaRuntime
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AwsLambdaRuntimeApi

    public class MicronautLambdaRuntime
extends java.lang.Object
implements AwsLambdaRuntimeApi
    Class that can be used as a entry point for a custom Lambda runtime.
    Since:
    1.1
    Author:
    graemerocher
